course.subject: ECON
course.name: Advanced Macroeconomics
course.description: For third-year students. The course provides a deeper thinking of macroeconomics with theories and examples, the course will separate economic growth and real business cycles; and help students to understand and evaluate effect of macroeconomic factor changes, policy change on the economy and the responses to them; as well as understand the limitation of existing macroeconomic theories.
course.prerequisites: ECON 3024 OR ECON 3143
